name: Vagrants
description: Colloquially referred to as 'Parasite Players', Vagrants are Nexus-tier parasites that were once human, but kept their faculties via unknown means.$(br)Given the breadth of information on this species, it has received a chapter of its own.$(br)It would be wise to start with the section on '$(l:vagrant/bloom)Corpse Bloom$()', as it will be referenced heavily throughout.
